name: Bebek Tepi Sawah Villas & Spa

reviews.title: Beautiful place to stay!
reviews.text: We just returned from a wonderful 11 days in Bali splitting our time with Nusa Dua and Ubud. What a treasure we found with Tepi Sawah in Ubud.

reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
reviews.text: This exceptional boutique style hotel is what anyone would want with respect to tranquility, comfort, pleasant staff, and total relaxation.

description: Bebek Tepi Sawah Villas is located south east of ubud, about 2 km to the citi center, and 27 km from the international Denpasar Ngurah Rai Airport.25 units exclusive luxury villas, mix design of traditional with modern touch facing to the rice field and beautiful tropical garden view.Free shuttle service to ubud citi center at anytime from 9am until 10pm, provide you with 2 public big swimming pool, arts gallery, spa, and the most famous restaurant of Bebek Tepi Sawah Restaurant and the Crispy Duck menu
